sourcesContent:
import React, {useState} from 'react' import './booking.css' import { Form, FormGroup, ListGroup, ListGroupItem, Button } from 'reactstrap' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' export const Booking = ({tour}) => { const {price, reviews} = tour const navigate = useNavigate() const [credentials, setCredentials] = useState({ userId: '01', userEmail: 'example@gmail.com', fullName: '', phone: '', guestSize: 1, bookAt: '' }) const handleChange = e => { setCredentials(prev=>({...prev, [e.target.id]: e.target.value})) } const handleClick = e => { e.preventDefault(); console.log(credentials); navigate('/thank-you'); } const serviceFee = 10 const totalAmount = Number(price) * Number(credentials.guestSize) + Number(serviceFee) return

${price} /per person

Information
${price} 1 person
${price}
Service charge
${serviceFee}
Total
${totalAmount}
}
